cannotaddnote: Está desconectado. Su nota se ha añadido a la lista de tareas pendientes, una vez reconectado se podrá enviar
cannotconnect: No se puede conectar: Verifique que la URL es correcta y que el sitio Moodle usa la versión 2.4 o posterior.
cannotconnectssl: No se puede conectar: Verifique que la URL es correcta y que el sitio Moodle usa la versión 2.4 o posterior y que el certificado SSL es válido.

contentyetnotavailable: Este tipo de actividad no está disponible aún
deletesitefiles: ¿Está seguro de que desea borrar todos los archivos descargados de este sitio?
enableautosynccss: Enable synchronization of additional CSS style sheet
enableautosyncws: Enable synchronization of operations and data
enablenotificationswarning: In order to enable notifications we need to store information like your mobile device model and operating system in the Moodle site.
errorcameramsg: Device does not support a camera
errorduringdevicetokenrequesttoapns: Error during device token request to APNS
helpmelogin:
In order to log in, please verify that:

1. The Moodle site is version 2.4 or above.
2. The Moodle site administrator has enabled Mobile access.

To test the app in a Moodle demo site type teacher or student in the Username field and click the Add button.

Visit the Moodle documentation site for more detailed information and help.
imagestored: Su imagen se ha guardado en su zona de archivos privada
invalidaccount: Please check your login details or ask your site administrator to check the site configuration.
invalidmoodleversion: Invalid Moodle version. The minium version required is:
invalidscheme: Please provide a valid site URL.
invalidsite: La URL del sitio es inválida.
lostconnection: We lost connection you need to reconnect. Your token is now invalid
name: Nombre
networkerrormsg: Conexión no disponible o sin funcionar.
notificationsnotsupported: Notifications are not yet supported on Android systems.
rdebuggingenabledfor: Remote debugging will be enabled during the following seconds:
recordstored: Your recording has been stored in your private area
reportbuginfo:
Tap on the email button for sending a bug report via email

Don't forget to write a detailed description of the problem in the email body

Note that some debugging information will be attached (not private information)
requiredfields: All required fields must be completed.
siteurlrequired: Site URL required, i.e http://www.yourmoodlesite.abc or https://www.yourmoodlesite.efg
unexpectederror: Unexepected error. Please close and reopen the application to try again
uploadingtoprivatefiles: Subiendo a su área de archivos privada

writeherethebug: Escriba aquí una descripción detalla del problema
